author: Catherine McGrath
title: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF becomes fastest-ever ETF to accumulate $70 billion
description: BlackRock’s IBIT reached the mark five times faster than State Street’s gold fund.
content: BlackRocks iShares Bitcoin Trust (IBIT), the largest Bitcoin exchange-traded fund on the market, has attracted $70 billion in total assets more quickly than any other ETF, adding a new milestone to i… [+2461 chars]
